__toString( ) : string

Output the form object in a basic HTML format. Each form element is formatted to a 1:1 label to element ratio, using

,
and
tags. Required fields' labels have class="required" and error messages have class="error" for styling purposes.

Returns

render( boolean $ret = false ) : void

Render the form object either using the defined template or by a basic 1:1 DL/DD tag structure. The template should use a simple search and replace format that contains [{element}] and/or [{element_label}] for the placeholders that will be swapped out. Required fields' labels have have class="required" and error messages have class="error" for styling purposes.

Parameters
Name Type Description
$ret boolean
Throws
Exception Description
\Pop\Form\Exception
renderWithTemplate( ) : void

Method to render the form using the template

renderWithoutTemplate( ) : void

Method to render the form using a basic 1:1 DD/DL layout
